Text:
I bought this and it sucks, okay I want all of RLS and I should get it free since I got the game, but no I BUY this and still only get like 3 songs I want, They say the only way to get the RLS CD is to buy the whole set for $70, that's even worse, with this I get 2 disks - 3 songs I dont like, when with that I get 7 disks- 2 disks I dont like (Playback FM is good too)
